item.title: Raichur: Unidentified individual attempts to film video inside girls toilet, complaint lodged
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: Unidentified individual attempts to film video inside girls toilet, complaint lodged
Vartha Bharati | 22-12-2024 | 20:17:00 IST
Representational Image | PC: Meta AI
Raichur: An unidentified individual has allegedly attempted to film videos of female students using a mobile phone from the girls toilet of the Rajlabanda Morarji Desai Backward Class Hostel in Manvi taluk of the district. The incident is reported to have taken place on December 19 at around 10 pm.
The hostel which is ...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
